title: Educational Curation in the Digital Age: Information Selection and Utilization Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and information retrieval skills
context.additional_context: Targeting job seekers, this program requires the ability to curate and systematically apply credible information for social sector competency development. Emphasizes self-directed learning experiences in microlearning environments using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can select at least three credible information sources aligned with educational objectives and explain the selection criteria
Learners can create personal/team curation portfolios that systematically classify information on given topics
Based on curation results, learners conduct social issue analysis projects and propose improvements through peer evaluation
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
